content: {"locationId": "8953", "organizationId": "7388", "name": "Cartwright Community Center", "address1": "309 North 4th Avenue ", "address2": "", "city": "Cartwright", "state": "OK", "zipCode": "74731", "country": null, "phone": "", "phoneExt": "", "website": null, "latitude": "33.85517", "longitude": "-96.56199", "foodPrograms": "Hot/Cold Meal Program", "serviceAreas": "CITY:  Achille, Calera, Cartwright, Colbert, Mead, Silo", "languages": "English, Spanish", "features": "Air Conditioning", "aboutUs": "Our Mission: Is to see people in and of our communities transformed by the love of God. Our Statement of Faith: We exist due to our call to the great need in Cartwright Oklahoma and the surrounding communities for those that are broken, hungry and in need. We are answering that call according to the word of God through the actions of the Cartwright Community Resource Center. According to Matthew 25:37-40 \" Then the righteous will answer Him' Lord when did I ever see you hungry and feed you, or thirsty and give you something to drink ? When did we see you as a stranger and invite you in, or needing clothes and clothe you ? When did we see you sick or in prison and go to visit you ? \" The King will reply, ' Truly I tell you, whatever you did for the least of these brothers and sisters of mine, you did for Me.\"", "notes": "Monthly Community Outreach listed below. All Outreach Events are the 4th Saturday of the month unless noted and all are FREE  January - Chili cook-Off  February - Volunteer/Donor Banquet  March - Community Clean Up Day  April - Community Easter Egg Hunt * Saturday before Easter at the First Baptist in Cartwright  May - Mother's Night out Dinner * Saturday before Mother's day  June - Father's Day Fish Fry * Saturday before Father's day  July - Back to School Supplies Giveaway * Last Saturday in July 9-11 am Colbert City Park  August - Job Fair  September - Health Fair  October - Halloween carnival for kids * On Halloween  November - Community Thanksgiving Dinner  December - Project Christmas * 3rd week of December- Toy Drive, Senior party, Homebound Senior baskets, Homeless Baskets and Breakfast with Santa   ", "contactName": "", "contactPhone": "580-965-3039", "contactEmail": "", "servicePrograms": "", "foodServiceTypes": "Accepts Walk-Ins, CSFP Program, Indoor Service, Shopper Choice", "dietRestrictions": "Diabetic/Low Sugar, Vegan, Vegetarian", "foodOfferings": "", "networkAffiliations": [{"regionId": 64, "regionName": "Regional Food Bank of Oklahoma", "logoBlobNameSmall": "b268ff1b-39fa-45f4-a37e-421975c3f339.png", "website": "https://www.regionalfoodbank.org/"}], "timeZoneName": "Central Standard Time", "timeZoneCode": "CT", "offsetHours": "-5", "schedules": ["Sunday 1:30 PM-4:00 PM (Potluck & Church)", "Monday 8:30 AM-1:00 PM", "Tuesday 8:30 AM-1:00 PM", "Wednesday 8:30 AM-1:00 PM", "Thursday 8:30 AM-1:00 PM", "Friday 1:00 PM-5:30 PM (Dinner & Bingo)"], "services": [], "specialHours": []}
